languages.text: "По-моему, достаточно, чтобы заподозрить в тебе врага Человечества".
"I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "По-моему, достаточно, чтобы заподозрить в тебе врага Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “我认为，目前对你不利的证据已经足以让我将你视为人类之敌了。”
languages.original_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “我认为，目前对你不利的证据已经足以让我将你视为人类之敌了。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「お前を人類の敵とみなすには、証拠が不十分だ」
languages.original_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を人類の敵とみなすには、証拠が不十分だ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Considero que las pruebas contra usted son suficientes para considerar{mf|le|la} {mf|un|una} enemig{mf|o|a} de la humanidad».
languages.original_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Considero que las pruebas contra usted son suficientes para considerar{mf|le|la} {mf|un|una} enemig{mf|o|a} de la humanidad».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Die Beweise gegen Euch sind ausreichend, um Euch zum Feind der Menschheit zu erklären."
languages.original_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Die Beweise gegen Euch sind ausreichend, um Euch zum Feind der Menschheit zu erklären."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « J'estime les preuves contre vous suffisantes pour vous déclarer {mf|ennemi|ennemie} de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « J'estime les preuves contre vous suffisantes pour vous déclarer {mf|ennemi|ennemie} de l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Seni İnsanlığın düşmanı ilan etmeye yetecek kadar delilim olduğuna hükmediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I deem the evidence against you sufficient to cast you as an enemy of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Seni İnsanlığın bir düşmanı olarak ilan etmeye yetecek kadar delilim olduğuna hükmediyorum."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
